article_title: What Is A Year Of Life Worth?

article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman

og.description: If there is one thing most conservatives and liberals agree on it’s that we should not consider cost in deciding whether people should undergo medical procedures that have the potential to save lives and cure diseases. Unfortunately, most conservatives and liberals are wrong. Declaring the idea of cost effectiveness a “forbidden [...]
